version_description:
* bug fixes
* supermoon mode
* Hot fix for iOS 7 crashes and improved accuracy

* Mini-Moon
The notification center widget now shows the current moon phase, illumination percentage, as well as an image of the current moon. Thanks for the requests for this feature.

* Apple Watch
Support for Apple Watch glance view and notifications.

* Small bug fixes
Swiping behavior is now fixed. Thanks Jason C.
New moons are slightly more accurate.

Thanks for all the positive reviews. Feel free to request features in your review. I read them all.

This update comes from your feedback. I read every App Store review, and you can always contact me directly through my website. charliedeets.com

New Features:
Added forthcoming moon events to Notification Center widget

Bug Fixes:
Date picker bug where information would disappear when selecting current date from picker
Improved accuracy of moon images around new moon
Improved accuracy of full moonâ€™s illumination percentage
More accurate information when app is launched

New:
Setting to disable background star animation
Bug fixes

Tip Jar:
I added a button if you'd like to support the development of MOON. I have a bunch of features lined up for the next couple releases and I also have to do some maintenance work to keep the push notifications working. If you'd like to help out, I'd be honored. Just so you know, I will never add advertisements to MOON.

v7.5: Big update!

* iPad Multitasking Support
Rewrote the interface so it works everywhere in basically every position you can imagine.

* Shake for Star Harp
Now when you shake the moon, it will get out of the way so you play the stars. Can't wait to hear what songs you make the moon sing.

The new version of Moon has been updated for iOS 10 and features tons of improvements. Here are some of them:

- New notification system with more reliable notifications
- New and improved app for Apple Watch
- Redesigned iOS 10 widget
- You can now 3D touch on the app icon to display the widget in iOS 10
- iPad now has larger moon image
- Lots of bug fixes and small improvements

Thanks for using MOON! I read every App Store review so feel free to request features and improvements. You can always contact me directly through my website. charliedeets.com

- Share the current moon with the new iMessage app!

- No more crashes when saving the moon to Camera Roll
- Upgrade to the notification system
- Various other bug fixes
- The shared URL is now moonapp.me

Thanks to Apple I can now respond to reviews, so feel free to put any feature requests or suggestions in a review. I read them all. If you want to contact me directly you can always message my through my website charliedeets.com.

I have some bigger features in mind for the next release, but I'll be waiting until after Apple releases the next version of iOS so I can take advantage of anything that might be relevant. Cheers!

New Feature

- Hemisphere mode
In your Settings, go to Moon->Hemisphere and select Southern if you'd like to view what the moon looks like from the Southern Hemisphere. Northern Hemisphere remains the default setting.

- App size has been substantially reduced
- Save image bug has been fixed
- An issue with sending the moon via iMessage app has been fixed

- Support button is now titled Donate
